name: Toxic Trips
description:
An unknown virus outbreak has struck one of your village. Cure your kingdom before everything is lost. Watch your citizens, they might have unwanted diseases traveling with them. Research new techs to make your kingdom better prepared for survival. Apply quarantine action and seal the fate of inhabitants inside when there is no other option.....

Win condition:

Research the cure to save your kingdom.

(Cure is unlocked after any of the 5 technologies have been researched.)

Lose condition:

All of the settlement are destroy by the disease
